message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid drawn-out negotiations.
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  This round presents a good opportunity for both of us to secure a decent share before inflation eats away at the value.
Bob, my offer in round 1 was fair. Now, it's even more crucial to settle before inflation hurts us both further. I'm willing to take a small hit to get this done.
